name: gns3-mcp
description: Control and automate GNS3 network labs through Claude with type-safe operations
long_description: Version 0.3.1 bugfix: Fixed validation error when nodes have None console_type. Version 0.3.0 features: Type-safe Pydantic models, two-phase link validation prevents partial topology changes, performance caching (10Ã— faster batch ops), multi-adapter support, detailed error messages. BREAKING CHANGES: All tools return JSON, set_connection requires adapter parameters. Features: project/node/link management, auto-connecting consoles, port availability validation, corrupted link detection. Supports GNS3 v3 API with telnet console access.

gns3_host.title: GNS3 Server Host
gns3_host.description: GNS3 server hostname or IP address

tools.name: list_projects
tools.description: List all GNS3 projects (returns JSON array of ProjectInfo)

tools.name: open_project
tools.description: Open a GNS3 project by name (returns JSON ProjectInfo)

tools.name: list_nodes
tools.description: List all nodes in current project (returns JSON array of NodeInfo)

tools.name: get_node_details
tools.description: Get detailed node information (returns JSON NodeInfo)

tools.name: get_links
tools.description: List all network links with adapters/ports (returns JSON array of LinkInfo)

tools.name: set_node
tools.description: Configure node properties and/or control state (start/stop/suspend/reload/restart)

tools.name: send_console
tools.description: Send commands to node console (auto-connects if needed)

tools.name: read_console
tools.description: Read console output (full buffer or diff mode)

tools.name: disconnect_console
tools.description: Disconnect from node console session (returns JSON status)

tools.name: get_console_status
tools.description: Check console connection status for a node (returns JSON ConsoleStatus)

tools.name: set_connection
tools.description: Batch manage network connections with two-phase validation (requires adapters)
